Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake article that was not published by Newshub, the media site it claims to be from.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the town is removing the trout statue due to an offended vegan, but there is no evidence or confirmation of this.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the District Council of Gore has denied any plans of removing the trout statue and stated that there have been no threats.
Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as an exaggeration as it presents a scenario of a statue being removed due to the complaint of a single offended vegan, without any evidence to support it.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters as it is based on a fake article and contradicts the statements from the District Council of Gore and Newshub.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
